column2: it is a very good restaurant. A high end with a well matched price. Because of the complex menu
column3: it may be better to ask omakse
column4: Chef to just take care of you. Sushi is excellent. May be one of the best in Houston? I like Kubo's but it is more flavorful because they add touch of fruit juice. Typical technique used in some high-end sushi place in Japan.
